title: CV-Matheus-Longo
name: startbootstrap-CV-Matheus-Longo

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:pug && npm run build:scss && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:assets

description: [Clean Blog](https://startbootstrap.com/theme/clean-blog/) is a stylish, responsive blog theme for [Bootstrap](https://getbootstrap.com/) created by [Start Bootstrap](https://startbootstrap.com/). This theme features a blog homepage, about page, contact page, and an example post page along with a working PHP contact form.
author: Start Bootstrap
